title.value: Find GMP Documents which are scheduled to be withdrawn in next 30 days

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

property_page.value: Withdrawal Query form properties next 30 days

repeating.value: Find GMP/Med Device Documents scheduled for Withdrawal

dql_value.value: select * from cd_quality_gmp where planned_withdraw_date >= DATE(TODAY) and DATEDIFF(day,DATE(TODAY), planned_withdraw_date) <= 30 and planned_withdraw_date is not nulldate and a_status != 'Withdrawn'
